title: Pixel5 doesn't support new assistant
content:
I set up my Pixel5 with my existing account and the assistant style isn't the new one (with the flashy color on the bottom).
I reset factory my Pixel5, with no account logged in (no migration process, nothing), and same thing.

Where the strange behavior occurs is when I set up a multi user account, create a new user and I log in with my existing account in this (and get all my assistant existing configuration), it works perfectly.

I really don't understand why, with the "owner" user account it doesn't work, and with a new "sub-account" it works great.

Being desperate, I'm waiting an update, but if you have a tip....
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 5
